DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study evaluate effectiveness individual cognitive behavioral therapy ( CBT ) supportive psychotherapy ( SP ) reduce bulimic symptom among adolescent .
DOC.brief_title: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy Adolescents With Bulimia
DOC.detailed_description: Patients randomize equal chance either receive CBT SP . Participants include individual DSM-IV bulimia nervosa ( BN ) , patient sub-threshold BN . Adolescent patient treat New York State Psychiatric Institute , target recruitment 20 patient complete study . Participants condition assess prior treatment end treatment . This trial intend serve pilot investigation determine feasibility utility large control study population .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 12 18 2 . DSMIV diagnosis bulimia nervosa subthreshold bulimia nervosa ( binge eat and/or purge least per week ) 1 . Diagnosis bipolar disorder 2 . Current psychosis 3 . Drug alcohol abuse past 3 month 4 . Acute Suicidal Risk 5 . Major depression produce significant functional impairment 6 . Significant medical illness 7 . Weight outside normal weight range ( 85 % 120 % 50th percentile age measure standard growth chart )
